item.villagertools.guard.tooltip: 可用於將掠奪者轉化為小鎮自衛隊
item.villagertools.guard.used: 他們不再是你的敵人了。
item.villagertools.gears.tooltip: 升級鐵魔像的防禦和大腦
item.villagertools.gears.used: 玩家保護系統已啟動。 防禦升級。
item.villagertools.bribe.tooltip: 賄賂村民以忘記犯罪並提高您的聲譽
item.villagertools.cure.tooltip: 村民的古代殭屍治療藥
item.villagertools.cure.used: 治療已經開始了...保證他們的安全
item.villagertools.contract.tooltip: 邀請流浪商人尋找新家
item.villagertools.contract.used: Accepted and signed.  Keep them safe!
item.villagertools.darkness.tooltip: Imbues dark witchcraft into some villagers and illagers
item.villagertools.forget.tooltip: Reading will dispel villagers from their profession
item.villagertools.knowledge: Grimoire of the Lost Merchants Guild
item.villagertools.lure.tooltip: Villagers and Guards are historically drawn to these
item.villagertools.key.tooltip: Unlock the reins of a Wandering Trader Llama
item.villagertools.key.used: They have been freed from bondage
item.villagertools.restock.tooltip: 與村民交換以升級他們的交易
